subject: Phase 2-B: Create backend/services/llm_service.py
description:
Create new file backend/services/llm_service.py with:
- generate_search_queries(user_query, num=5) → Use Gemini LLM to expand a user query into multiple search queries
- generate_refinement_queries(original, feedback) → Generate refined queries based on feedback

Use google.genai Client with GEMINI_API_KEY from backend.config.
Pattern: async functions, return List[str].
Existing service pattern reference: backend/services/gemini_image.py uses genai.Client(api_key=GEMINI_API_KEY)
